name: The Beatles: Adventures in Pepperland
overview:
Once upon a time... or maybe twice... there wa an unearthly paradise called Pepperland. 80000 leagues beneath the sea, it lay- or lie- I'm not too sure.

The protectors of Pepperland, Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band have been captured by THE BLUE MEANIES. Their plan is to ban music and steal all colour.

Admiral Fred in his Yellow Submarine recruited THE BEATLES to be the new protectors, bring back the music and the colours.

Only they can save Pepperland!
